common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Returns top 200 recommended affiliates that can be added to a campaign
params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the \"page_size\" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single \"page\" of data. 


Note: The response size will up to 200.

","name":"page_size","sample":"50","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"PPdsXYP"}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"error_auth","type":"string","required":null,"key":"kwCtzQJ"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"Invalid access_token.","type":"string","required":null,"key":"YPEzArz"},{"name":"request_id","type":"string","sample":"b937c04e554847789cbf3fe33a0ad5f1","description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","key":"AyXKyPn"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"yxGTXQ","children":[{"description":"

The total count of affiliates that recommended for shop id. 

","name":"total_count","sample":"200","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"PyBxjEn"},{"description":"

Recommended Affiliate list. Not all return fields will have values.

","name":"affiliate_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"BzeeRbe","children":[{"description":"

The unique key for the current affiliate.

","name":"affiliate_id","sample":"12345678","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"WCjmMNz"},{"description":"

The name of the affiliate.

","name":"affiliate_name","sample":"affiliate a","type":"string","required":null,"key":"QKPYfmd"},{"description":"

The shopee user name or affiliate name for this affiliate.

","name":"user_name","sample":"ss","type":"string","required":null,"key":"RhddmGG"},{"description":"

The portrait url of affiliate.

","name":"portrait_url","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"CiGPCBY"},{"description":"

The popular social media of this affiliate.

The platform of this social media account.

","name":"platform","sample":"meta","type":"string","required":null,"key":"XbXWNTR"},{"description":"

The follower count of this account.

","name":"follower_count","sample":"","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"eZawHMp"}]},{"description":"

Social media account list of this affiliate.

","name":"social_medias","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"FRwNGjF","children":[{"description":"

The platform of this social media account. 

","name":"platform","sample":"shopee live","type":"string","required":null,"key":"ipckSjG"},{"description":"

The follower count of this account.

","name":"follower_count","sample":"1000","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"cWhZjQK"},{"description":"

Social media name of this account.

","name":"social_media_user_name","sample":"dafffd","type":"string","required":null,"key":"nXnsmm"}]},{"description":"

","name":"total_click","sample":"12000","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"eexTxyr"},{"description":"

","name":"order_range","sample":"[200,400]","type":"int64[]","required":null,"key":"aZfettp"},{"description":"

Range number of the GMV in the last 30 days.

","name":"gmv_range","sample":"[1000000000000,5000000000000]","type":"int64[]","required":null,"key":"jkNPHE"},{"description":"

Golden tick means affiliates create high quality contents with good sales conversion in Shopee Live or Shopee Video.

","name":"is_orange_tick_kol","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"AfjDpEd"},{"description":"
